item.title: Business Broadband and Phone Comparison
item.description: Small and mid-sized businesses require both internet and phone service. While ordering these services separately remains an option, businesses now have more choices. Bundled services, offering both phone and internet, often make the most sense for smaller businesses with limited needs and budgets. Two primary bundled options provide cost savings compared to separate services. The first option, known as Integrated T1 or SIP Trunking, utilizes line sharing but differs in connection methods.
